trans-unit.target:
TEXT_BANANA404_03053_SEQ_00<tab>Eshana wants your assistance in training a new recruit.
※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
TEXT_BANANA404_03053_TODO_00<tab>Spar with the Ananta recruit in the Striped Hills.
TEXT_BANANA404_03053_TODO_01<tab>Speak with the Ananta instructor.
TEXT_BANANA404_03053_TODO_02<tab>Report to Eshana.

TEXT_BANANA404_03053_ESHANA_000_000<tab>Have you a moment or two to ssspare, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>? I have an overconfident recruit who could benefit from a sssparring sssession with one of your experience.
TEXT_BANANA404_03053_ESHANA_000_001<tab>Captain Alpa is expending every effort to sssecure our position here on the bridge, and we cannot afford to have unreliable sssoldiers in our ranksss.

TEXT_BANANA404_03053_ESHANA_000_002<tab>You will find thisss recruit training with an inssstructor in the Striped Hills─open my sssister's eyes to her shortcomings, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.
TEXT_BANANA404_03053_ANANTASOLDIER03053_000_010<tab>You... You're the eikon-ssslayer! What need do you have of one like me?
TEXT_BANANA404_03053_ANANTASOLDIER03053_000_011<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）
TEXT_BANANA404_03053_ANANTAKLEADER03053_100_011<tab>You've come to train our ssstone-headed sssister? Good. She has talent for the ssspear and the blade, but has yet to learn the value of humility.
TEXT_BANANA404_03053_ANANTASOLDIER03053_000_012<tab>If you're ready to ssspar, then let usss be about it!
TEXT_BANANA404_03053_BALLOON_000_020<tab>Do your worssst!
TEXT_BANANA404_03053_BALLOON_000_021<tab>But, I thought... I need to catch my breath...
TEXT_BANANA404_03053_BALLOON_000_022<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）
TEXT_BANANA404_03053_ANANTAKLEADER03053_000_025<tab>You ssstrike with admirable force, but do not underessstimate your opponent.
TEXT_BANANA404_03053_ANANTAKLEADER03053_000_026<tab>I appreciate the way you humbled her, ssstrider. Watching you fight was as much a joy for me as it was a lessson for her.

TEXT_BANANA404_03053_ANANTAKLEADER03053_000_027<tab>And now that you have knocked her down, it will be my job to build her up again─thisss time with better habitsss I should hope. Eshana will be pleased.
TEXT_BANANA404_03053_ESHANA_000_030<tab>How went the training?
TEXT_BANANA404_03053_ESHANA_000_031<tab>Hah! You ssspared her no mercy, then! That is good. I only hope that the change to her perssspective lasssts longer than her bruises.
TEXT_BANANA404_03053_ESHANA_000_032<tab>And if it doesn't, well...I may sssend you for another sssparring match!
TEXT_BANANA404_03053_ANANTAKLEADER03053_000_035<tab>Return to Eshana─I will follow up on the “educational” drubbing you gave my sssister.
